StreamClientProducer.​TwitchClient
StreamClientProducer.​TwitchClient

This class is responcible for getting the messages from Twitch through an irc client.  Each channel being connected to will have its own instance of this class.

Constants
ALLOWABLE_FAILURES
const int ALLOWABLE_FAILURES
RESET_CYCLES
const int RESET_CYCLES
username
private const string username
Variables
path
private static string path
password
private static string password
trimChar
private static char[] trimChar
Constants
lengthMin
const int lengthMin
Variables
cross class shared resources
messageQueue

Messages will be enqueued to this queue in order to make them availible to KafkaProducer

trigger

this timer is the trigger for the event to check for new messages

blacklist

a collection of users who ar enot participating and messages should be excluded

client resources
client

the TCP client that connects to the twitch irc channel

writer

the stream writer that will write to the irc channel

reader

the stream reader that reads from the irc channel

cycles

the number of events that have triggered since the last reconnect

channel

the name of the twitch channel being connected to

Functions

String channel,
ref System.Timers.Timer trigger,
ref ConcurrentQueue<string> queue,
ref HashSet<string> blacklist
)

The constructor for this class.

Parameters
channel
String

the name of the channel to connect to

trigger
ref System.Timers.Timer

a refrence to the timer shared by all TwitchClient objects, triggers the event handler

queue
ref ConcurrentQueue<string>

a refrence to the queue shared by all the TwitchClient objects and the KafkaProducer

blacklist
ref HashSet<string>

the users who ar enot participating and should be ignored

CThread
public void CThread()

Does the primary connect to the twitch irc channel and then subscribes its event handler to trigger

Kill
public void Kill()

unsubscribes the event handler from trigger allowing the object to be disposed of

closeClassResources
private void closeClassResources()

Closes the resource used by the class

flushResources
private void flushResources()

Closes the client resources and then reconnects

onTick
private void onTick(
Object source,
ElapsedEventArgs e
)

This is the event handler that reads from the irc client when trigger triggers

Connect
void Connect()

The function that connects all the client resources to the irc channel
